attributes.action: The UK government intervene and suspend the Stormont government over RHI scandal
attributes.additional_details: With only the DUP partaking in recent assembly hearings and a vote of no confidence being thrown out of the chamber by the speaker, it is obvious that the government in Stormont is not stable.
attributes.background: With the recent RHI scandal in Stormont involving the Northern Ireland First Minister Arlene Foster, we believe that the UK government should suspend the institutions in Stormont with the potential outcome being a new election in Northern Ireland.
